nodes.text: The Shekelesh-class freight gunship, also known as the Moogan smuggler ship or Moogan cargo ship, was a model of freighter and gunship manufactured by the Techno Union. The freighter was used by a ring of Moogan and Gotal smugglers from Mooga operating on the planet Mandalore.

Prior to the Invasion of Naboo, Jee Kra's crew used a gunship after he bought the captured Padawan Eldra Kaitis. Darth Maul and a contingent of bounty hunters killed the crew and took it for themselves, but it was sabotaged by Xev Xrexus and crashed on the Moon of Drazkel.
The Shekelesh-class freight gunship was created for Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
